relation: Part, hang out with friends, watch TV
There are a lot of fast food restaurants.
The dorm life is great. I love it! I wouldn't ask for anything better
Stay focused. You have to be disciplined.
Fort Valley is one of the BEST HBCU's anyone could attend. The overall atmosphere is GREAT! There is no way you could not love this school/
pageTitle: Fort Valley State University (FVSU) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {144164=I have never lived on campus but judging from stories told to me, It is a fun experience. There have been newer dorms opened since 2009, and everyone loves them., 24104=Food and dining is great. We get different foods for different holidays. Around Mardi grass we get a lot of cajun food and for cinco de mayo we get Mexican food., 171761=The cafeteria is wonderful. They just renovated it. The have this special time called Late Night that ends at 10:30. So, after all that studying you can go and grab a bite to eat in the cafe that's located on campus., 234424=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 145338=Fort Valley is a great experience for all kind but especially those of a minority group. It has grown much over the past 3 years including a new gym, new dorms and a new student center. Receiving my degree from Fort Valley State University, in December, will be 1 of the biggest accomplishments in my life!}
